document.full_text: nyse euronext  and deutsche boerse ag  are weighing several options to win support for their $10.2 billion deal, including paying special dividends to shareholders, three sources briefed on the matter said on wednesday.
document.title: nyse, deutsche boerse mull payouts to win support
lines_and_colors: nyse euronext  and deutsche boerse ag  are weighing several options to win support for their $10.2 billion deal, including paying special dividends to shareholders, three sources briefed on the matter said on wednesday.
